main event: A person reported seeing an unidentified flying object in the sky while driving on a road at night.
interesting points: The object was described as flashing with a pinkish-reddish color and making a sound like a motor.
The witness provided a hand-drawn sketch of the UFO, depicting an elongated, elliptical-shaped object with a rounded top and bottom.
The witness reported that the object appeared to be sharply outlined and changed direction during the sighting.
The witness was not sure of the exact size or distance of the object, but estimated it could be covered by the head of a match held at arm's length.
The witness reported the sighting to authorities on September 26, 1961, but it's unclear if anyone else witnessed the event.
photographs: yes, a hand-drawn sketch of the object
